summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York inquiring about the status, custody, and content of a video related to the Tartaglione/Epstein case from July 23.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, inquiring about a video related to the Tartaglione/Epstein case.

events.title: Tartaglione/Epstein video
events.description: A video related to the Tartaglione/Epstein case, the subject of inquiry regarding its custody and content.

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney is actively seeking information about a specific video related to the Tartaglione/Epstein case as of December 2019.
The video is dated July 23, though the year is not specified in the inquiry.
The email seeks to determine who possesses the video and what it depicts.
The inquiry originates from the Southern District of New York, a key jurisdiction in the Epstein investigation.
